We aim to provide accurate, timely, and easy-to-understand information to help students, job seekers, and individuals stay updated with important news and opportunities. Our Mission Our mission is to simplify the job search process and make government schemes (Yojanas) accessible to everyone. We believe in empowering people with authentic information that can help them build a better career and future. Our Vision To become India‚Äôs most reliable online platform for government job alerts, yojana updates, and educational guidance. We strive to be a bridge between opportunities and the people who need them most. <!DOCTYPE html> Privacy Policy - Gajab Jobs Privacy Policy At Gajab Jobs (https://www.gajabjobs.com), we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard the data you share with us. Information We Collect Personal details (like name, email) if you contact us directly. Non-personal data such as browser type, IP address, and pages visited. Cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience. How We Use Your Information Your information may be used to:
Respond to your queries or feedback. Improve our website and services. Send job alerts, yojana updates, or newsletters (only if you subscribe). Ensure security and prevent fraud. Cookies Policy We use cookies to analyze website traffic and enhance your browsing experience. You may choose to disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not function properly. Third-Party Services Gajab Jobs may display ads (such as Google AdSense) or use analytics tools. These third-party services may collect information in accordance with their own privacy policies. Data Protection We take appropriate measures to secure your personal information and prevent unauthorized access. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. Children‚Äôs Privacy Our services are not directed at children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with the ‚Äúlast updated‚Äù date.
